# VisualShaderNodeCurveTexture

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeResizableBase](VisualShaderNodeResizableBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Performs a [CurveTexture](CurveTexture.md) lookup within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Comes with a built-in editor for texture's curves.
